original_text: As for the other events of Azariah’s reign, and all he did, are they not written in the book of the annals of the kings of Judah?
korean_text: 아사랴의 남은 사적과 행한 모든 일은 유다 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: As for the other events of Azariah's reign
are they not written in the book
of the annals of the kings of Judah
